breakfast.Name: Breakfast tacos
breakfast.Ingredients: Bacon & Eggs, Ham & Eggs, Eggs & Cheese, Eggs & Beans

breakfast.Name: Chilaquiles
breakfast.Ingredients: Cooked tortilla chips on tomatoe sauce with beans, ham, sunny side or scramble eggs, and cheese

lunch.Name: Burrito
lunch.Ingredients: Meat: Fajita, Chicken, Asada, beans, sour cream, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, wrapped in a large flour tortilla

lunch.Name: Bistec Ranchero
lunch.Ingredients: Hand-made Corn or Flour tortillas, Fajita meat cooked with green peppers, onions. Side of Rice and Beans,  lettuce, tomatoe, and home made Guacamole
